# color(_:pixelFormat:)

**Type Method**

Indicates that a texture contains color data to interpret in a specific color space.

## Declaration

```swift
static func color(_ colorSpace: TextureResource.Format.ColorSpace, pixelFormat: MTLPixelFormat) -> TextureResource.Format
```

## Discussion

The created texture uses the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/TextureResource/Semantic-swift.enum/color] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/TextureResource/Semantic-swift.enum/hdrColor] semantic.

## Creating the format

- **normal(_:pixelFormat:)**: Indicates that a texture is a normal map.
- **raw(pixelFormat:)**: Indicates a texture for unmodified use by a shader.
